Name: Open-Access Multimodal Dataset of Pituitary Adenoma

HowToAcknowledge:
If you use this dataset in your work, please cite:

Černý M, Májovský M, Valošek J, et al. Open-access multiparametric MRI dataset of pituitary adenoma and benchmark analysis of five segmentation models. Scientific Data. [Under review].
EthicsApprovals: This study was approved by the institutional ethical committee of Military University Hospital Prague (ref. nr. 108/17-11/2022). Data were anonymized at the time of patient inclusion and treated according to the ethical standards of the Declaration of Helsinki. A written informed consent with data acquisition and publication was obtained from all participants after thoroughly informing the participant.
